data.title: EarthMC
data.text:
(This is a stub to revised and edited by Kristaux)

The Kingdom of Saxony is a nation that is in Northern-Germany and North-Holland. It was established by KristauxSoftQT on July 3rd 2021.

Geography

The capital town is landlocked in the region of Lower-Saxony, where it consists of a forested meadow with little elevation. The next largest town, Waddenzee, is in North Holland and the West-Frisian islands and holds territory in the Wadden Sea and parts of the Netherlands. It also has some land in Switzerland in the town of Sion, and has several protectorates in South Africa and Antarctica. For more information on this, visit the Saxonic Empire page.

Political System

The Capital is Nuremberg, but the nation is de-centralised, and Waddenzee is more like a vassal and has political autonomous function, but remains a town within the nation. Saxony is a Kingdom, and is currently part of the German Confederacy.

History

The Union of Waddenzee and Nuremberg

On the 24th of August, 2021, the Duke of Waddenzee agreed to join the nation if the King converted to Shrekism, which he did. The construction for a temple in Nuremberg was promised.

The Protectorates

Throughout the start of September, 2021, Saxony gained several protectorate-vassals. One in South Africa and two in Antarctica- the rump of these states being the South-Pole.

Towns

.
